data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Da Silveira, Luiz F. L., Souto, Paula M., Mermudes, J. R. M. (2018): Four new species of Luciuranus fireflies from the Brazilian Atlantic Rainforest (Coleoptera: Lampyridae). Zootaxa 4413 (1): 173-186, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.1.7|20 occurrences
